Morons! Listen to me! I have 1.51 firmware. Download Disc1. Run abgx latest version on Disc 1. Convert to wave 3 (if using 1.51 fimware)! Burn with IMGBURN on Verbatim! Play! Download Disc 2! Run abgx! It will fail at VID CRC. Download video patch which is found on thepiratebay! Unrar that file so you have an .iso file! Open abgx. In the 'Manually patch or Extract File tab' click patch video and select the video file you just unrared (not the image of the game but the patch). Run abgx 2 times. Burn with IMGBURN on VERBATIM! Play! Disc 3: Repeat the same steps of Disc 2! It works with the same patch! Thats it!
Correction! Seems the patch only works with the 2nd disk and not with the 3rd! Havent tried on the 3rd so can any1 confirm?

ATTENTION THOSE WITHOUT LT FIRWARE: 
you can still play this game, or other wave 11 games, you just need to patch the wave file down to wave 3 with the latest wave patcher and then use the activator disk on your xbox that forgoes the security check. only do this on a banned xbox however as you will likely be flagged immediately.

the latest wave watcher can be found at librasoft [dot] fr [slash] 360WavesPatcherINSTALL [slash] INSTALL [dot] EXE

^^ i can personally verify this will fix any issues with all 3 disks as well as ive finished the game. you will need to also make sure your xbox is updated to the latest dashboard by downloading the latest version from m$ to a usb drive and updating it manually or you will get stuck in a continuous update loop from the disk since as it cant completely update from a burned game.
